projects.title: Animals and Coins
projects.description: Brought in as an outsourced Senior Unity Developer and eventually promoted to Game Team Lead through Narrasoft Inc in the Philippines. I developed several reusable game features such as a Card system with sub features such as a randomized Card Chest, Joker, and Trading. I also developed a Deeplinking system which is used for rewarding and inviting users into the game.

projects.title: Tiles of Fortune
projects.description: Second game of Innplay Labs. I mainly did integration of existing systems and tools from the Animals and Coins project.

projects.title: Murasaki7 Anime Puzzle RPG
projects.description:
Extended gameplay code to support PvP. On top of the gamemplay change, I also developed and maintained an in-house matchmaking system using Unity & PlayFab. This project is also the first time I used Unity's new Addressables system. 
 
 I used it to develop and maintain an audio system that dynamically loads sound assets to prevent memory leaks. I developed tools that serialize excel data sheets into in-engine data structures. Lastly, I developed sound mixing and voice localization tools for other Developers and Designers for ease of integration in the Unity Game Engine.

projects.title: Double Win Vegas
projects.description: Started out on the project as an Intern developing social features such as chat and an in-game social panel for players to interact with each other. Eventually I was taken in as a full-time Software Engineer, and I maintained other existing features such as a shop, clubs, and social lobby. Improving the code base and overall performance.
